original_text: Cain spoke to Abel his brother. And when they were in the field, Cain rose up against his brother Abel and killed him.
korean_text: 가인이 그의 아우 아벨에게 말하고 그들이 들에 있을 때에 가인이 그의 아우 아벨을 쳐죽이니라

sentences.original_text: Cain spoke to Abel his brother.
And when they were in the field,
Cain rose up against his brother Abel
sentences.korean_translation: 가인이 자기 동생 아벨을 거슬러 일어나서,
